name: Bob Peters
text:
Bob Peters here,

This place is DYNAMITE. They blew my socks off. Blew my hair back. I almost blew a load after setting off just one of their fine selection of quality fireworks. I wouldn't recommend anywhere else for all your fireworking needs and desires in the greater Birmingham area. Over and out, Your friend, Bob Peters

name: Jennifer Honeycutt
text: WELL I GAVE ONE STAR CAUSE ITS NOT HERE ANYMORE

name: Tyler
text:
I can't say enough about Van and his super friendly helpful staff, they will go out of their way to help you, answer any questions you have. By far the best fireworks retailer in the south east and the only one who carries red apple product. I wish yall the best with the new website and hope yall have a wonderful black friday / Thanksgiving and a great new years season!

Tyler J~

resp.text: Thank you Tyler - we appreciate your business!

name: John Coughlin
text: Drove 2 hours to get our fireworks and the savings through Red Apple fireworks was amazing. Well worth the trip and all the fireworks we obtained performed flawlessly. Definitely coming back for more

name: ?¿ THE // UNDERGROUND // SOCIETY ?¿
text: Haven't checked it out yet always drive by on the 20 always wanted to stop by but was wondering if there is parking big enough for a big rig?

resp.text: Huge Parking Lot!  We can take care of 53 foot trucks - come see us beginning Black Friday
Thanks for the review Quardell - hope you enjoy your Fireworks!

name: Mahogany Sharunda Conda
text: I needed some help putting together a show! They gave me all the info I needed to make it happen Danny and Stephanie are amazing! One stop shop!!!

name: Khori Oden
text: Thunder on the mountain is the best fireworks show in the state of Alabama period

name: Ben Jackson
text: They were extremely knowledgeable and helpful and put on the best shows in Alabama.
